name: Generate Sovos Report
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

block.name: search_rows
block.title: Select rows in netsuite_1099_vendor
block.description: Select rows in netsuite_1099_vendor table in MySQL

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable

block.comment: Search MySQL for all Vendors with a state!="vendor-calculated"
If there are any results, stop this job (still waiting on vendors to be calculated).

block.name: search_rows
block.title: Select rows in netsuite_1099_boardmember
block.description: Select rows in netsuite_1099_boardmember table in MySQL

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable

block.name: search_rows
block.title: Select rows in netsuite_1099_vendor
block.description: Select rows in netsuite_1099_vendor table in MySQL

input.where: (box1 + box2 + box3 + box4 + box5 + box6 + box7 + box8 + box9 + box10 + box13 + box14 + box15a + box15b + box18) > 600

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable

block.comment: Get all Vendors from MySQL (which includes the calculated 1099 box values) whose total amount is more then $600
If the list size is less than 1000, we have reached the last page.
If the error is anything other than the end of looping through all vendors, stop this job with an error

block.name: declare_list
block.title: Create attachments list
block.comment: This list is responsible for storing the CSV binary data of board members and rest of the vendors, and their relevant file names

input.column_labels:

PAYEE_TIN
PAYEE_NAME

extended_input_schema.label: CSV data lines
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide field mappings for the CSV data below.

input.column_labels:

block.comment: 1099 details of vendors excluding board members

block.name: insert_to_list
block.title: Add item to attachments list
block.comment: 1099 details of vendors excluding board members

block.name: send_mail

input.subject: ="Sovos Report - "+lookup("NETSUITE_VARIABLES", key: "1099.year")["value"]
input.body: ="Hi,"  + "\n" + "Greetings for the day."+ "\n" + "Please find the attachments of Sovos Report - " + lookup("NETSUITE_VARIABLES", key: "1099.year")["value"]

block.comment: Send email containing "1099 details of vendors and board members" to dedicated recipients

block.name: search_entries

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry

block.comment: Get all the recipes that are auto-started for 1099 generation
Stop all the recipes that were auto-started
